column5: Spoke with the guys at the show and they have a great family deal. Told them we wanted to focus on good pike with enough walleye to eat, and per there availability we ended up with Snare Lake for June 4th for 5 days this spring. I'm sure we are in for some decent fishing but I was wondering if anyone has had experience with this lake, or the air service and their lakes in general. Any advice would be great!  Cheers, Andrew
PM me a list of any specific questions.  I've fished it (and stayed 6 days) along with the two connecting lakes Magiskan and Bateman.
